General.Name: Hunya Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunya Foods Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture, processing, and trade of food products in Taiwan. The company offers candies, biscuits, chocolates, moon cakes, pastries, bread, cakes, and other food products; and operates gift shops. It also provides its products online. The company offers its products under the 77, Rivon, and Republic Of Chocolate brands. Hunya Foods Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 5F., No. 3, Aly. 8, Ln. 45, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23145
